summary: Reno, nicknamed "The Biggest Little City in the World," is a city in northwest Nevada, near the California border. It's the third largest city in Nevada and has a population of over 264,000. Named after Civil War General Jesse L. Reno, the city is a popular tourist spot due to its casinos and nearby attractions like Lake Tahoe. title: Reno, Nevada
